data.name: SqlSelectCommand1.CommandText
data.value: SELECT UserNaam, AllowUpdateMain, AllowUpdateProductRequirements, AllowUpdateProductionColors, AllowUpdateAllColors, AllowUpdateHistoricalData, AllowUpdateFabrics, AllowUpdateProductInformation, AllowUpdateExceptionalSmsQty, AllowUpdatePoDetails, AllowUpdateProcessFlow, AllowUpdateCosting, AllowUpdateOverheads, AllowUpdateSourcing, AllowUpdateForecast, AllowDelete, ShowProductRequirements, ShowProductionColors, ShowAllColors, ShowHistoricalData, ShowFabrics, ShowProductInformation, ShowExceptionalSmsQty, ShowPoDetails, ShowProcessFlow, ShowCosting, ShowOverheads, ShowSourcing, ShowForecast, Merchandiser, IsAdmin, StyleAdmin, CostingAdmin FROM Param_Users

data.name: SqlInsertCommand1.CommandText
data.value: INSERT INTO [Param_Users] ([UserNaam], [AllowUpdateMain], [AllowUpdateProductRequirements], [AllowUpdateProductionColors], [AllowUpdateAllColors], [AllowUpdateHistoricalData], [AllowUpdateFabrics], [AllowUpdateProductInformation], [AllowUpdateExceptionalSmsQty], [AllowUpdatePoDetails], [AllowUpdateProcessFlow], [AllowUpdateCosting], [AllowUpdateOverheads], [AllowUpdateSourcing], [AllowUpdateForecast], [AllowDelete], [ShowProductRequirements], [ShowProductionColors], [ShowAllColors], [ShowHistoricalData], [ShowFabrics], [ShowProductInformation], [ShowExceptionalSmsQty], [ShowPoDetails], [ShowProcessFlow], [ShowCosting], [ShowOverheads], [ShowSourcing], [ShowForecast], [Merchandiser], [IsAdmin], [StyleAdmin], [CostingAdmin]) VALUES (@UserNaam, @AllowUpdateMain, @AllowUpdateProductRequirements, @AllowUpdateProductionColors, @AllowUpdateAllColors, @AllowUpdateHistoricalData, @AllowUpdateFabrics, @AllowUpdateProductInformation, @AllowUpdateExceptionalSmsQty, @AllowUpdatePoDetails, @AllowUpdateProcessFlow, @AllowUpdateCosting, @AllowUpdateOverheads, @AllowUpdateSourcing, @AllowUpdateForecast, @AllowDelete, @ShowProductRequirements, @ShowProductionColors, @ShowAllColors, @ShowHistoricalData, @ShowFabrics, @ShowProductInformation, @ShowExceptionalSmsQty, @ShowPoDetails, @ShowProcessFlow, @ShowCosting, @ShowOverheads, @ShowSourcing, @ShowForecast, @Merchandiser, @IsAdmin, @StyleAdmin, @CostingAdmin); SELECT UserNaam, AllowUpdateMain, AllowUpdateProductRequirements, AllowUpdateProductionColors, AllowUpdateAllColors, AllowUpdateHistoricalData, AllowUpdateFabrics, AllowUpdateProductInformation, AllowUpdateExceptionalSmsQty, AllowUpdatePoDetails, AllowUpdateProcessFlow, AllowUpdateCosting, AllowUpdateOverheads, AllowUpdateSourcing, AllowUpdateForecast, AllowDelete, ShowProductRequirements, ShowProductionColors, ShowAllColors, ShowHistoricalData, ShowFabrics, ShowProductInformation, ShowExceptionalSmsQty, ShowPoDetails, ShowProcessFlow, ShowCosting, ShowOverheads, ShowSourcing, ShowForecast, Merchandiser, IsAdmin, StyleAdmin, CostingAdmin FROM Param_Users WHERE (UserNaam = @UserNaam)

data.name: SqlUpdateCommand1.CommandText
data.value: UPDATE [Param_Users] SET [UserNaam] = @UserNaam, [AllowUpdateMain] = @AllowUpdateMain, [AllowUpdateProductRequirements] = @AllowUpdateProductRequirements, [AllowUpdateProductionColors] = @AllowUpdateProductionColors, [AllowUpdateAllColors] = @AllowUpdateAllColors, [AllowUpdateHistoricalData] = @AllowUpdateHistoricalData, [AllowUpdateFabrics] = @AllowUpdateFabrics, [AllowUpdateProductInformation] = @AllowUpdateProductInformation, [AllowUpdateExceptionalSmsQty] = @AllowUpdateExceptionalSmsQty, [AllowUpdatePoDetails] = @AllowUpdatePoDetails, [AllowUpdateProcessFlow] = @AllowUpdateProcessFlow, [AllowUpdateCosting] = @AllowUpdateCosting, [AllowUpdateOverheads] = @AllowUpdateOverheads, [AllowUpdateSourcing] = @AllowUpdateSourcing, [AllowUpdateForecast] = @AllowUpdateForecast, [AllowDelete] = @AllowDelete, [ShowProductRequirements] = @ShowProductRequirements, [ShowProductionColors] = @ShowProductionColors, [ShowAllColors] = @ShowAllColors, [ShowHistoricalData] = @ShowHistoricalData, [ShowFabrics] = @ShowFabrics, [ShowProductInformation] = @ShowProductInformation, [ShowExceptionalSmsQty] = @ShowExceptionalSmsQty, [ShowPoDetails] = @ShowPoDetails, [ShowProcessFlow] = @ShowProcessFlow, [ShowCosting] = @ShowCosting, [ShowOverheads] = @ShowOverheads, [ShowSourcing] = @ShowSourcing, [ShowForecast] = @ShowForecast, [Merchandiser] = @Merchandiser, [IsAdmin] = @IsAdmin, [StyleAdmin] = @StyleAdmin, [CostingAdmin] = @CostingAdmin WHERE (([UserNaam] = @Original_UserNaam) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateMain = 1 AND [AllowUpdateMain] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateMain] = @Original_AllowUpdateMain)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateProductRequirements = 1 AND [AllowUpdateProductRequirements] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateProductRequirements] = @Original_AllowUpdateProductRequirements)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateProductionColors = 1 AND [AllowUpdateProductionColors] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateProductionColors] = @Original_AllowUpdateProductionColors)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateAllColors = 1 AND [AllowUpdateAllColors] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateAllColors] = @Original_AllowUpdateAllColors)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateHistoricalData = 1 AND [AllowUpdateHistoricalData] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateHistoricalData] = @Original_AllowUpdateHistoricalData)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateFabrics = 1 AND [AllowUpdateFabrics] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateFabrics] = @Original_AllowUpdateFabrics)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateProductInformation = 1 AND [AllowUpdateProductInformation] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateProductInformation] = @Original_AllowUpdateProductInformation)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateExceptionalSmsQty = 1 AND [AllowUpdateExceptionalSmsQty] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateExceptionalSmsQty] = @Original_AllowUpdateExceptionalSmsQty)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdatePoDetails = 1 AND [AllowUpdatePoDetails] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdatePoDetails] = @Original_AllowUpdatePoDetails)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateProcessFlow = 1 AND [AllowUpdateProcessFlow] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateProcessFlow] = @Original_AllowUpdateProcessFlow)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateCosting = 1 AND [AllowUpdateCosting] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateCosting] = @Original_AllowUpdateCosting)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateOverheads = 1 AND [AllowUpdateOverheads] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateOverheads] = @Original_AllowUpdateOverheads)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateSourcing = 1 AND [AllowUpdateSourcing] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateSourcing] = @Original_AllowUpdateSourcing)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateForecast = 1 AND [AllowUpdateForecast] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateForecast] = @Original_AllowUpdateForecast)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowDelete = 1 AND [AllowDelete] IS NULL) OR ([AllowDelete] = @Original_AllowDelete)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowProductRequirements = 1 AND [ShowProductRequirements] IS NULL) OR ([ShowProductRequirements] = @Original_ShowProductRequirements)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowProductionColors = 1 AND [ShowProductionColors] IS NULL) OR ([ShowProductionColors] = @Original_ShowProductionColors)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowAllColors = 1 AND [ShowAllColors] IS NULL) OR ([ShowAllColors] = @Original_ShowAllColors)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowHistoricalData = 1 AND [ShowHistoricalData] IS NULL) OR ([ShowHistoricalData] = @Original_ShowHistoricalData)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowFabrics = 1 AND [ShowFabrics] IS NULL) OR ([ShowFabrics] = @Original_ShowFabrics)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowProductInformation = 1 AND [ShowProductInformation] IS NULL) OR ([ShowProductInformation] = @Original_ShowProductInformation)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowExceptionalSmsQty = 1 AND [ShowExceptionalSmsQty] IS NULL) OR ([ShowExceptionalSmsQty] = @Original_ShowExceptionalSmsQty)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowPoDetails = 1 AND [ShowPoDetails] IS NULL) OR ([ShowPoDetails] = @Original_ShowPoDetails)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowProcessFlow = 1 AND [ShowProcessFlow] IS NULL) OR ([ShowProcessFlow] = @Original_ShowProcessFlow)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowCosting = 1 AND [ShowCosting] IS NULL) OR ([ShowCosting] = @Original_ShowCosting)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowOverheads = 1 AND [ShowOverheads] IS NULL) OR ([ShowOverheads] = @Original_ShowOverheads)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowSourcing = 1 AND [ShowSourcing] IS NULL) OR ([ShowSourcing] = @Original_ShowSourcing)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowForecast = 1 AND [ShowForecast] IS NULL) OR ([ShowForecast] = @Original_ShowForecast)) AND ((@IsNull_Merchandiser = 1 AND [Merchandiser] IS NULL) OR ([Merchandiser] = @Original_Merchandiser)) AND ((@IsNull_IsAdmin = 1 AND [IsAdmin] IS NULL) OR ([IsAdmin] = @Original_IsAdmin)) AND ((@IsNull_StyleAdmin = 1 AND [StyleAdmin] IS NULL) OR ([StyleAdmin] = @Original_StyleAdmin)) AND ((@IsNull_CostingAdmin = 1 AND [CostingAdmin] IS NULL) OR ([CostingAdmin] = @Original_CostingAdmin))); SELECT UserNaam, AllowUpdateMain, AllowUpdateProductRequirements, AllowUpdateProductionColors, AllowUpdateAllColors, AllowUpdateHistoricalData, AllowUpdateFabrics, AllowUpdateProductInformation, AllowUpdateExceptionalSmsQty, AllowUpdatePoDetails, AllowUpdateProcessFlow, AllowUpdateCosting, AllowUpdateOverheads, AllowUpdateSourcing, AllowUpdateForecast, AllowDelete, ShowProductRequirements, ShowProductionColors, ShowAllColors, ShowHistoricalData, ShowFabrics, ShowProductInformation, ShowExceptionalSmsQty, ShowPoDetails, ShowProcessFlow, ShowCosting, ShowOverheads, ShowSourcing, ShowForecast, Merchandiser, IsAdmin, StyleAdmin, CostingAdmin FROM Param_Users WHERE (UserNaam = @UserNaam)

data.name: SqlDeleteCommand1.CommandText
data.value: DELETE FROM [Param_Users] WHERE (([UserNaam] = @Original_UserNaam) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateMain = 1 AND [AllowUpdateMain] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateMain] = @Original_AllowUpdateMain)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateProductRequirements = 1 AND [AllowUpdateProductRequirements] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateProductRequirements] = @Original_AllowUpdateProductRequirements)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateProductionColors = 1 AND [AllowUpdateProductionColors] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateProductionColors] = @Original_AllowUpdateProductionColors)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateAllColors = 1 AND [AllowUpdateAllColors] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateAllColors] = @Original_AllowUpdateAllColors)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateHistoricalData = 1 AND [AllowUpdateHistoricalData] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateHistoricalData] = @Original_AllowUpdateHistoricalData)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateFabrics = 1 AND [AllowUpdateFabrics] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateFabrics] = @Original_AllowUpdateFabrics)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateProductInformation = 1 AND [AllowUpdateProductInformation] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateProductInformation] = @Original_AllowUpdateProductInformation)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateExceptionalSmsQty = 1 AND [AllowUpdateExceptionalSmsQty] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateExceptionalSmsQty] = @Original_AllowUpdateExceptionalSmsQty)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdatePoDetails = 1 AND [AllowUpdatePoDetails] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdatePoDetails] = @Original_AllowUpdatePoDetails)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateProcessFlow = 1 AND [AllowUpdateProcessFlow] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateProcessFlow] = @Original_AllowUpdateProcessFlow)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateCosting = 1 AND [AllowUpdateCosting] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateCosting] = @Original_AllowUpdateCosting)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateOverheads = 1 AND [AllowUpdateOverheads] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateOverheads] = @Original_AllowUpdateOverheads)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateSourcing = 1 AND [AllowUpdateSourcing] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateSourcing] = @Original_AllowUpdateSourcing)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowUpdateForecast = 1 AND [AllowUpdateForecast] IS NULL) OR ([AllowUpdateForecast] = @Original_AllowUpdateForecast)) AND ((@IsNull_AllowDelete = 1 AND [AllowDelete] IS NULL) OR ([AllowDelete] = @Original_AllowDelete)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowProductRequirements = 1 AND [ShowProductRequirements] IS NULL) OR ([ShowProductRequirements] = @Original_ShowProductRequirements)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowProductionColors = 1 AND [ShowProductionColors] IS NULL) OR ([ShowProductionColors] = @Original_ShowProductionColors)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowAllColors = 1 AND [ShowAllColors] IS NULL) OR ([ShowAllColors] = @Original_ShowAllColors)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowHistoricalData = 1 AND [ShowHistoricalData] IS NULL) OR ([ShowHistoricalData] = @Original_ShowHistoricalData)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowFabrics = 1 AND [ShowFabrics] IS NULL) OR ([ShowFabrics] = @Original_ShowFabrics)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowProductInformation = 1 AND [ShowProductInformation] IS NULL) OR ([ShowProductInformation] = @Original_ShowProductInformation)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowExceptionalSmsQty = 1 AND [ShowExceptionalSmsQty] IS NULL) OR ([ShowExceptionalSmsQty] = @Original_ShowExceptionalSmsQty)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowPoDetails = 1 AND [ShowPoDetails] IS NULL) OR ([ShowPoDetails] = @Original_ShowPoDetails)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowProcessFlow = 1 AND [ShowProcessFlow] IS NULL) OR ([ShowProcessFlow] = @Original_ShowProcessFlow)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowCosting = 1 AND [ShowCosting] IS NULL) OR ([ShowCosting] = @Original_ShowCosting)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowOverheads = 1 AND [ShowOverheads] IS NULL) OR ([ShowOverheads] = @Original_ShowOverheads)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowSourcing = 1 AND [ShowSourcing] IS NULL) OR ([ShowSourcing] = @Original_ShowSourcing)) AND ((@IsNull_ShowForecast = 1 AND [ShowForecast] IS NULL) OR ([ShowForecast] = @Original_ShowForecast)) AND ((@IsNull_Merchandiser = 1 AND [Merchandiser] IS NULL) OR ([Merchandiser] = @Original_Merchandiser)) AND ((@IsNull_IsAdmin = 1 AND [IsAdmin] IS NULL) OR ([IsAdmin] = @Original_IsAdmin)) AND ((@IsNull_StyleAdmin = 1 AND [StyleAdmin] IS NULL) OR ([StyleAdmin] = @Original_StyleAdmin)) AND ((@IsNull_CostingAdmin = 1 AND [CostingAdmin] IS NULL) OR ([CostingAdmin] = @Original_CostingAdmin)))
